name: Simply Slimming Corset - Multi Color
description:
The Simply Slimming Corset comes in a variety of colors: Purple, Yellow, Blue, and Pink. Our corset gives you curves and a slimmer waist. Consistent use during workout or just being active day-to-day will transform the shape of your body. Are you ready to enhance your workout? Wear the Simply Slimming Corset to "slim and train your body to bring out your simply curvy silhouette."

The Simply Slimming Corset is considered "high-compression" and is intended to have an extremely tight fit. This corset is constructed from a latex core with a soft cotton exterior and interior lining that allows you to train your waist by lifting, shaping, slimming, and flattening your stomach and waist. As your body slims, two columns of hook and eye closures allow the garment to slim down with you. Wear the Simply Slimming Corset for a minimum of 8-10 hours a day, for at least 30 days to experience long-term results and train your waist. (If your stomach is a little larger, choose a size up to ensure fit.).

Simply Slimming Corset Results:

*Toning abdominal muscles and strengthens core
*Lose inches instantly ideally 1-4 inches in 30 days (results may vary)
*High compression
*Discreetly worn under clothes
*Reduce waist and abdomen
*Ideal for exercise
*Improves posture
*Accelerates weight loss through compression and sweating


PLEASE SPECIFY YOUR CORSET COLOR AND SIZE WHEN PLACING YOUR ORDER.

name: Simply Slimming Vest
description:
The Simply Slimming Vest gives you curves and a slimmer waist, targeting the unwanted "back fat". Consistent use will transform the shape of your body to slim and train your body to bring out your curvy silhouette.
The Simply Slimming Vest is considered "high-compression" and is intended to have a tight fit. As your body slims, two columns of hook and eye closures allow the garment to slim down with you. Wear the Simply Slimming Vest for a minimum of 8-10 hours a day, for at least 30 days to experience long-term results

name: Simply Slimming Belt Size Chart
description:
The Simply Slimming Belts is NOT sized using the traditional sizing chart. It is important that you refer to our sizing chart to ensure a proper fit. If you stomach is a little larger, or if you're between sizes, choose a size up to ensure fit.   

Our corsets are designed to be worn daily, even while you sleep. The tight and form fitting garment works to mold, reshape, and transform your mid-section while you sleep and during day-to-day activities.
